Class SmoothMover

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      SmoothMover

public abstract class SmoothMover
extends greenfoot.Actor

A variation of an actor that maintains precise location (using doubles for the co-ordinates instead of ints). It also maintains a current velocity in form of a velocity vector.

Version:
2.2
Author:
Poul Henriksen, Michael KÃ¶lling (Including improvements suggested by J. Buhl.)

Method Detail

accelerate

public void accelerate(double factor)
Accelerate the speed of this mover by the given factor. (Factors less than 1 will decelerate.) The direction remains unchanged.

Modify velocity by adding another velocity vector.

move

public void move()
Move in the direction of the velocity vector. This simulates movement in one time unit (dt==1).

setLocation

public void setLocation(int x,
                        int y)
Set the location of this actor. Redefinition of the standard Greenfoot method to make sure the exact co-ordinates are updated in sync.
